description: This is a market on which team will win the UEFA Champions League Final, scheduled for May 29, 2021, 9:00 PM CET (4:00 PM ET; 10:00 PM local time): Manchester City or Chelsea. This market will resolve to “Man City” if Manchester City wins the UEFA Champions League Final. This market will resolve to “Chelsea” if Chelsea wins the UEFA Champions League Final. If, for any reason, this match is postponed and a new match date is set for June 5, 2021, 4:00 PM ET or earlier, the same rules for market resolution will apply for the rescheduled match. If this match is rescheduled for any date after June 5, 2021, 4:00 PM or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
